abstract: Boeing is using new technology not only to build its 787 Dreamliner aircraft but also to promote it: The company has commissioned a series of large-format videos running on the aircraft’s Web site to promote the 787 to potential passengers and airline customers, aviation enthusiasts and others.

lead_paragraph: Boeing is using new technology not only to build its 787 Dreamliner aircraft but also to promote it: The company has commissioned a series of large-format videos running on the aircraft’s Web site to promote the 787 to potential passengers and airline customers, aviation enthusiasts and others.
